query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ai_knowledge_base` (
	`id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
	`module` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
	`title` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
	`description` text NOT NULL,
	`code_snippet` text,
	`api_endpoint` varchar(255),
	`dependencies` json,
	`tags` json,
	`version` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
	`created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
	`updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
	CONSTRAINT `ai_knowledge_base_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ai_contributions` (
	`id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
	`ai_source` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
	`ai_api_key` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
	`contribution_type` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
	`title` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
	`description` text NOT NULL,
	`target_module` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
	`target_file` varchar(500),
	`proposed_code` text,
	`diff_patch` text,
	`status` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
	`validation_score` int,
	`validation_errors` text,
	`backup_id_before_apply` int,
	`applied_at` timestamp,
	`applied_by` varchar(100),
	`impact_score` int,
	`user_feedback` text,
	`created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
	`updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
	CONSTRAINT `ai_contributions_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ai_evolution_feedback` (
	`id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
	`contribution_id` int NOT NULL,
	`feedback_type` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
	`message` text NOT NULL,
	`metrics` json,
	`created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
	CONSTRAINT `ai_evolution_feedback_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

	`created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
	CONSTRAINT `ai_evolution_feedback_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
